talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$[Tip] I want to learn about Missions!$
Use the guide below to help you carry out successful Missions in the Adventurer Guild.

$How to Check Missions$
Check a [Mission Board] located in Calderock Village, Lotus Marsh, Saint Haven, or Red Lotus Palace Thoroughfare or press the [ L ] hotkey to look at the Missions posted in the [Mission Board] tab.

$How to Complete Missions$
Missions can only be completed using a [Mission Board] located in Calderock Village, Lotus Marsh, Saint Haven, or Red Lotus Palace Thoroughfare.

※ Only after completing a Mission and receiving the reward will a new Mission appear in its place!
※ Keep in mind, if you delete a Mission another one will not appear for a long time!

$What's a Mission Shop?$
You will receive [Warrior Blood, Sweat and Tears Points] for completing Missions. You can use these points to purchase useful items from Adventurer Guild Member David, who is located near the Mission Board in Saint Haven.

$What are Co-op and Alliance Missions?$
Sometimes you'll notice the labels [Co-op] or [Alliance] next to Mission titles. If just one member of a party undertakes a Mission like this, all party members can get amazing rewards. If you get such a Mission request, form a party and ask for help carrying it out!

♣ You got a co-op/alliance Mission! Lucky you!
